General.Name: Elion Energy Co Ltd
General.Description: Elion Energy Company Limited manufactures and distributes coal chemical products in China and internationally. It offers polyvinyl chloride, caustic soda, ethylene glycol, methanol, synthetic ammonia, compound fertilizer, etc. that are used in chemical, light, building material, agriculture, medicine, and other industries. The company also engages in the supply chain business, as well as focuses on energy conservation and emission reduction. Elion Energy Company Limited was founded in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China.

2.Name: Ms. Jing Hui  Hou
2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
